TopicTitle: My WIP somewhat futuristic station, suggestions wanted

Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/gallery/oqYJP

Let me know what you think, I need suggestions on how to expand the front end and what else I could add.  I want a small degree of asymmetry with it, which I'm going to do with the tunnel on one side from the shuttle dock to the hub(see post for explanation).  Let me know what you think!

By the way I didn't embed it because Imgur's website format is much better IMO for looking at these albums.

Edited January 20, 2017 by SlabGizor117
Maybe add an escape pod or mini docks for more solar panels
Yeah I was thinking about adding more solar panels but it's already a very long, narrow type of station so I don't wanna go too far.  An escape pod is a good idea, though

Maybe a docking port for Mun missions? And a Mun program that would rely on this station?

 

edit: and some comm relays. LKO can have some blind spots for relay networks 

Edited January 23, 2017 by 53miner53

Add some engines to it. This way, you can go into an orbit of any planet you want,+ if you put on some ISRU gear and ore tanks, you could send down a tiny lander to minimus to help refill the station!
